sense.def:
A plant
je živo bitje, ki raste v zemlji in ima steblo, liste in korenino.

To plant a seed, plant, or young tree
pomeni dati seme, rastlino ali mlado drevo v zemljo, da bi raslo.

seg.quote: Each autumn we planted primroses in the garden.

sense.def:
To plant land
pomeni dati v zemljo določeno vrsto rastlin oziroma njihova semena, da bi rasla.

seg.quote: ...small front gardens planted with rose trees.

sense.def:
A plant
je tudi tovarna ali kraj, kjer pridobivajo električno energijo.

seg.quote: ...the re-opening of a nuclear plant after an accident.

sense.def:
Plant
so tudi veliki stroji, ki jih tovarna uporablja v svoji proizvodnji;

seg.quote: The company plans to spend nearly £1 billion on new plant and equipment.

sense.def:
To plant something somewhere
pomeni nekaj dati na neko mesto.

seg.quote: I planted my deckchair beside hers.
They had planted the bomb beneath the house.

sense.def:
To plant something such as a weapon or drugs on someone
pomeni dati nekaj, na primer orožje ali mamila, nekomu med njegove stvari, da bo po krivici obtožen za prekršek ali zločin.

seg.quote: I'm convinced the evidence was planted in John's flat.
